text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to announce the general availability of
Lambda at the edge AWS Lambda allows
developers to run code in the AWS Cloud
without provisioning or managing servers
Lambda at the edge extends his
capability by allowing you to now run
Lambda functions at Amazon cloudfront
Edge
locations by using Lambda at the Edge
you can modify HTTP requests and
generate new responses at Edge locations
without having to go back to the
original Source allowing you to deliver
fast customized web experiences for your
customers for example you can use ler at
the edge to customize content based on
the user's priorities this lets you
identify a user's location and type of
device and quickly select the ideal
content to deliver based on this
information you can also validate
visitors at the edge by detecting search
engine Bots and filtering this traffic
from origin servers with a capture page
you can get started with Lambda at the
edge in three simple steps simply log
into the AWS Lambda console develop and
Associate a function with the cloudfront
distribution of your choice once this
Association is created the function is
automatically replicated and ready to
run at every AWS Edge location when a
request for content is received Lambda
at the edge executes your function at at
the cloudfront edge location closest to
your end viewer and scales globally with
the volume of requests Lambda at the
edge is available to all customers
starting from today that's it thanks a
lot
[Music]
